alert.note: Alert for Osage (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 09 at 10:38AM CDT until May 11 at 3:15AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Gasconade River near Rich Fountain. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River near Rich Fountain. * WHEN...Until early Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 22.0 feet, At this height County Road 251 north of Fredericksburg is flooded and closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM CDT Monday the stage was 22.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:30 AM CDT Monday was 23.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late this evening and continue falling to 5.9 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat Gasconade River Rich Fountain 20.0 22.0 15.3 9.7 7.4 6.4 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
